text: shishyathwa padam malawa - 01

dengu rogaya eeds maduruwa roga wahakaya karagath rogayaki.mema wairasaya sharira gathawi mul dina paha athulatha ema rogiyagen le ura bona maduruwan sidu karana nawatha dashtayakadi pamanak rogaya thawa kenekuta bowima siduwe.dengu wairasaya ragath dengu maduruwa minis sirurata dashta kala wita maduruwage khetaya samaga wairasaya sharrragatha we.
kisima waraddak wi nathi ayurin aari karanaya ketiyen wisthara karana ladi kisiwek wena yamak prashna kale natha.
eya lokaye wadi pirisak wetha adu wayakin gena yannata haki uthsahayak.

aanduwata sambandha lanka sama samaja pakshaya, komiyunist pakshaya ha prajathanthrawadi wamanshika peramuna wisin widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya ahosi kirima athulu yojana kihipayak aanduwata idiripath kara thibe.
thriroda gasthu wadi karayi : bas gasthuth ihala yana lakunu !
habayi eehema post eka dapu eka mara wirayek wela.
mathsya bahula pradeshayak wala mehi karadiya dhiwara karmanthayata himiwanne pradhana thanaki.
sawasata bhawitha nokaranna.
aya kamata aaradhana karana patak nathi nisa ohu ethanin eliyata aawa.
awankawa me aaradhanawata mama kamathiyi.

engalanthaya niyama ayurin ilakkaya hambaa yamin sitiyadi ee mula pirima prathiwadinta aapasu laba demin nayaka mayik gatin (pandu 45 n lakunu 41 yi, hathare pahara 3 yi, haye paharayi) ohuge kadulla ahimi kara gaththeya.

onna ha pura kiyala mamama patan ganna wa.
mama ude ekolaha withara wenakal kamareta wela pothak allagena wada karanna uthsaha karamin hitiya.
dan meka nikan wena mokadda blogak wage ..

switsarlanthaye jiniwa bauddha wiharasthanaya mangin wesak pun pohoya wenuwen sanwidhanaya kala wishesha pinkama sandaha shri lankika, thayi lantha, buruma, swis saha anekuth jathika bauddha sadahawathun wishala pirisak sahabhagiwu bawa wiharadhipathi pujya thawalama dhammika himiyo pawasuha.

puththalama disthrik eekabaddha wipaksha parlimenthu manthri sanath nishantha winaya parikshanayen waradikaru kota pakshayen nerapa harime yojanawak milanga shrilanipa madhyama karaka sabha raswime di sammatha kara ganimata sudanamak pawathina bawa wartha we.
ape minissu eka athekin aparadhakarayanta biya wethi.
mema kalaya thula me wana wita nawa rajaye kabinat amathyawarun 16k, niyojya amathyawarun 08k ha rajya amathyawarun 06k diwurum di thibe.
adahas dakwa athi sama ta th sthuthiyi.
anek paththen apage wirodhara aarakshaka hamudawa yanuwen punapuna siya puwathpathwala, lipithula, deshana thula sadahan janatha wimukthi peramuna pawa hamudawa wiwechanaya kirimata patan gena atha.
deshapalana pakshawala pamanak nowa manawa himikam komisame yojana gana mathaya wimasimata siyaluma aagam wala nayaka samuluwak da kandawana bawayi janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kale.

thawada, jathakatta kathawehi dewadharma jathakayehi:- “dewathi sammuthi dewa, uppaththidewa, wisuddhi dewathi thiwidha, thesu mahasammthakalatho pattaya lokena dewathi sammaththatha rajakumaradayo samumuthidewa nama, dewaloke uppanatha uppaththashedawanama, khinasawa wisuddhi dewanama, chuththamapi chethan sammuthi dewanama, rajano dewiyo kumara, - pe - yanadin kiyanaladi.
meya naya yame thaththwayak da eseth nathnam wenath gataluwak da yanna pilibandawa parikshana aarambha kara athi bawa aar em es bandara mahatha sandahan kaleya.
chamara mata rawa yannata nagitweya.

namuth gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathata ayath bawata sadahan wu depala gonuwe adala niwasa pilibadawa satahan nothibu athara ee mahathage naminma niwasata pamini jala bilpathhi pitapath kihipayakda madhya wartha kara thibina.

ee janathawa ithama dhairyasampanna janathawak.labana maha kannayen pasuwa sampurnayenma swadhina pudgalayan hatiyata nidahase kisi kenekuta atha nopa owunta jiwith wimata puluwan thaththwayak athi weyi kiyala apita wishwasayi.
eya matha kalinawa goliya washayen wadath awadhanaya dinagath antharjathika sanwidhanayaki.
ee wagema thawa ganu lamayek hitiya ee dawaswala ee lamaya raswimaka sinduwak kiwwoth kiyannema "lambaa sawan ran patin" kiyana sinduwa.

api godak dena kamathiyi
chuti puthatath wena dewal...

kiriputhage withthi kirikat mamala nam hari apuruyagahuwath nogahuwath uu nam athuleyathorana unta dan nam amu kawilayameka apata therennathi rahasakyadanna kalekadi daskam dakke nathiparashut walin hamadama athulata panithiathapatha gaga binduwatama dawi yathiee mak unath hamadama athule randethiee kandayamata sitiya ekwilabinduwatama yanawa muladima dawilaelesata unath lankawata awidillajathika kandayame thanakuth himiwilaes.el.pi.eluth mohuhata jayawanneuthurata ekwela tharageta sarasennewadapennuwoth nisithana yali himiwannetim ekata mohu nathiwama bariwenne ...	16
ee nisama mama hithanne balaya wisin athi karana dushanayath ekka ee kapakirima yam mattamakata dushanaya wela thiyenawa.
anika thama mata rathu korolla ehema nane...(
hanikata yamu , hanikata yamu, wenne mokadayi balanta" mahalu aachchi ammage athin alla gath siya kale athulatama awidagena giya.
amma mage as deken dakinna aasayi.''

owuhu thama anugamikayange ha hithawathunge pamanak nowa samahara wita wiruddhawadinge pawa upan dinayakadi kek ekak yawannata da subhapathumak pirinamanna da magulata awamagulata danayata sahabhagi wennata da kalaya waya karannoya.
sawasata ha rathriyata nama, pinibama, pihinima, muhude ralla pagima wani jala krida kirima sudusu natha.
kadala piti, kaha ha nawum kiri mishra kara muhune aalepa karanna.
enamudu ma thawamath rakiyawak balaporoththuwen hulla hulla deshapalana
krikat thalaya wenas wela
dewana dinatath widuli bala sewaka upawasaya akhandawa
ee wagema chapage adahas dakwim jathiwadi swarupaye wuna.

roginta ha rogin balimata ena ayata me pahasukam mangin sahana salasa atha.me nisa sayanawalata sahabhagiwimata ha rogin balimata ena uthuru mada janathawata memangin labi athi sahanaya kiya nima kala nohakiya.

ese swadina wimata niyamitha piris athara kolambaa, gampaha, rathnapura, galla, hambanthota, mathale, mathara, anuradhapura, mahanuwara, kurunagala yana distha්rikwala amathiwarun sitina bawada danagannata atha.
pongditayi (anuradha* wishwatayi gahanne mama hari bayen rideyi da danne nahane kiyala.
mema wyapruthiye aramuna wanne nawa thakshanaya matha padanam wu wyapara rata thula bihi kirimayi.
nawa padamala kiyala aadhunika nirmana shilpin soyana wadasatahanak kala.
mata kisidu tharjanayak natha.

me athara, idiripath kara athi handa pata parlimenthu manthri ranjan ramanayakage katahanda sampala samaga sasadena bawa rasa parikshaka departhamenthuwa danumdi athayi nugegoda mahesthrath mohomad mihayil ada (26) wiwrutha adhikaranayedi danum dunna.
pahadilida kiyala ahawwe ee ganayi.
anarakshitha hangimak na.
me usawiye shalawen shalawata, hama dorak langama innawa, eeta kalin murakarayata wadiya balasampanna thawa murakarayek.
danata me athi ..tika tika passe kiyannam ko .
matha mata penne wade apayata yana hadayi.
api wishala mudal pramanayak me sancharaya sandaha laba dunna.
ese nomathi nam thaman siyalu denama wenath pasalwalata anuyuktha karannayi da ema lipiyen illa thibe.
eheth, rate thunen dekakatath wada bhumi pramanayak himi wiyali kalapayata ese nowe.
kiyana pothen wisthara kale 1900 tath kalin.
ee makandure madhush durakathanaya haraha mathara malli ha sambandha wemin ohu laba dun upades mathaya.
eya dewani dinatath pawathwini.
mema rekhawa osse thaman sithana andamata hethuwa owun waradi sahagathawa purusha deparshawaya athara purusha kalapaya saha kanthawange piyayuru papuwe soyagena athi bawayi.
wides gaman balaporoththu wana ayata suba shubhadayaka aaranchi labeyi.
eda galle deshapalana balawatha wu richad pathiranage chakgolayeku wu ke.pi.amarapala da pahi apekshakayeku wiya.
oya wage aya ohoma karanne asahanaya sansindawa ganna.
in anathuruwa polis sthanayata athuluwi mema wedi prahara ellakara thibe.
eya kantha parshwayata pamanak bawa wadiduratath pawasa atha.

salasine pradhana ginume mudal laksha 120 suba sadhaka sangama ginumata bara kara wyaja athsan yoda awastha 20 kadi mudal labagena athi bawata mulya aparadha kottashaya adhikaranaya wetha karunu wartha kara thibina.
eheth, eewa wuwath kenekuta penenne wimasilimath wuwahoth pamani.

me awasthawa pilibandawa hari awabodhayakin katayuthu nokalahoth 2015 janawari 08 nihanda wiplawaya aapasu karakawi eda gedara yawu mahinda rajapaksha palanaya yali genaeema sandaha prathiwiplawayak athiwimata ida thibena bawa wataha ganima awashyaya.
ekak 500 tikat...
sama thissema santhoshayen inna oona.
me lamaka pangara natta prasthuthayata adalawa adahas prakasha kirimata nohaki pussek bawa pahadiliwama penenawa.

gandhithumage jiwithaye noyek sihiwatana enam ohu wiwidha katayuthu waladi gath chayarupa, ohu wisin liyu liyakiyawili, noyek siththarun wisin andi ohuge sithuwam emenma ohu pilibandawa liyawunu dahasakuth ekak lipi lekhana narambaamin wisthara kathakayage eekakari handata sawan demin api aashramaya thula semen awida giyemu.
mage aadara thaththa
podu depala panatha yatathe hitapu aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathata erehiwa nithimaya kriyamarga ganima walakwalamin abhiyachanadhikaranaya ada warana niyogayak nikuth kala.

mama lankawen baharawa gos nomathi nisa lokaye anikuth ratawala wasikili gana sulu ho adahasak nomathi nisa eewa gana adahas pala kirimen walaki sitimi.ape rate podu wasikili salakimedi sathishaya bahutharayak amoniya gandhayen yukthaya.ee ganda kotharam saradayi kiwahoth obata doren athulata yamata siduwanne ganda aath math kota ganda atharin ringagenaya.ganda etharam ghana ya.wasikiliya thuladi dasa ariyoth amoniya sarata dasa dawenneya.kandulu galanneya.oba kandulu pisimin wasikiliyen pitathata paminena wita oba wasikiliye athi mahargha lekhanayan ho dukkhaya rasayen anuna kawak kiyawa andanneyayi awata sitinno sithathi.wasikili yanu katapath pawuru waniya.yanena aya owunge sithangi ehi liya yathi.thawa wasara pansiyakin dahakin pamana lankawe kanim karana china purawidyagnyayin mewa soyagena sanrakshanaya karanu atha.nam kara andinu laba athi sthri ha purusha rupa dawinchige witaෲwiyan minisa men agaya kerenu atha.me kala minisage aakalpa, sithum pathum, lingika prawanatha aadiya gana anagatha minisata thorathuru laba dena wadagath mulashrayak lesa salaka 'toyilatoloji' namin wenama widyawak arambaenu atha.namuth dan dan wasikili lekhana kalawa da kramayen abhawayata yamin pawathinne ya.e kala wasikiliwala thibu wishishta rasaliptha kawya rachana wenuwata dan aththe ketiyen awashyathawa ho sewawa sandahan kota liyu durakathana anka pamani.me thaththwaya wenas kirimata rajya madihath wimak awashya yayi sithe.eksath wasikili kalakaruwange sangamayak pihituwa rajayata balapam kala yuthuya.
owunata penne chinayata pawaru dakunu kolambaa waraya paryanthaya ha pot sitiya.
me anuwa shri lankawata thawath pradhana puhunukaruwaku ahimi wi awasan.
kolambaa 07, hektar keabbakaduwa mawathe, anka 04 darana sthanaye mema idikirim sidu karamin pawathi.
habayi rawula wawagena rathu shart andagena panthi walata samajaya beda gena dhanapathi panthiye kawuththa kanna ka gahana dayinosarayin nowe.
habayi ee hine haba karaganna lesi nathi unath..
kantha hinsanayata erehiwa
ewan wu niwasata, bhumiyata, niwasiyanata kalpa ganane gnyathi mithrayan wu bhutha kotas ema niwasiyanata noyekuth pidawan gena denneya.
enamudu ese wuye
chanda wadawalata eliyata bassa witadi nam wadipurama hamu wanne upathinma thamange deshapalana kandawura thora gath chanda dayakayo.

pathraya pahalata nonamath.

61.mema panatha yatathata ho eya yatathe sadana lada yam niyogayak yatathata watena waradak sambandhayen wenath yam nithiyaka patahaniwa sandahan wana kisiwak nosalakama mabhestha්rathwarayaku wisin laghu lesa wibhaga kirima saha ee sambandhayen niyamitha daduwam panawima nithyanukula wanne ya.

owun sirisawata saha ehi piliwethwalata aadhara dunne, owun thama thamange ratawala “wama” widwathun, wruththiya samithi ki්rayakarin, parlimenthu manthi්rawarun, ha wruththikayan athulath ekama dhanawath stharayak niyojanaya kala heyini.

ee anuwa daham pasal sewawanta da samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalayata ha kruthyadhikari mandalaye katayuthu walata da, labadena sahayogaya ehi idiri pawathma sandaha sawibala sampanna shakthiyak wana bawa bauddha katayuthu komasaris janaral washayen sandahan kirima mage parama yuthukamaki.bauddha katayuthu komasaris janaral chandraprema gamage

ee anuwa mama karuna parshwaye kolambaa sitina waran nohoth wiwekanandan, sami nohoth suresh rudra mastar, iniya barathi nohoth kumaraswami, marikan jeshilan yana aya samanga durakathana sabandatha pawathwa adahas ha thorathuru gaththa.
ee wagema eewa athara pariwarthanath igena ganna thiyenawa.
awashya web sarf karanna nam..

jiwithaya sundarayi.......3/28/13, 1:33

aththatama oya kiyana thana kochchara janakirna wunath palu , musala gathiyak thiyenawa , ethana idikarala thiyena rukmani dewi smarakaya nisa ee bawa thawath wadi wenawa, oya kiyana smarakaya thiyena hariya wanguwak sahithayi, ee wagema ema smarakaya thada sudu pahan yukthayi , rathri kaleyadi wahanayaka ena kenekta wanguwen mathu wena kotama wahane eliya watuna smarakaya penne sudu andagaththa gahaniyek para maddata wenna wage , polowen adi kipayak udata wenna innawa kiyala, poddak hithanna rathriyaka tikak wegen wahane padawana gaman eka paratama oya wage thigasmak aawoth mokada wenne, boho durata wahane gihin thappayak sipa gannawa noanumanayi .
